title: Pave Your Path to Holistic Wellness With Bao Zhong Tang Premium TCM Centre
author: Sandhya Mahadevan
description: Asia's leading luxury media group with award-winning digital platforms and print magazines
cleaned_text: comes first at this premium TCM centre, which is now in its 13th year of service Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM)'s approach to [wellness and overall development of a healthy body](https://sg.asiatatler.com/style/chinese-medicine-ingredients-help-boost-health) has always been to get to the root of health issues and not just the symptoms. This kind of holistic health concept is what Bao Zhong Tang Premium TCM Centre has practised for more than a decade. First set up as a private joint venture of SingHealth and the Shanghai Hospital Development Centre (SHDC) in 2007, it offers a variety of TCM services such as herbal medication, acupuncture, Tui Na, moxibustion, auricular-point pressing therapy, paediatric Tui Na, [post-partum care](https://sg.asiatatler.com/society/kai-suites-singapore-first-luxury-confinement-centre-opening-2020) and much more, each administered by the clinic's stellar team of physicians. (Related: [The Best Alternative Wellness Treatments to Try in Singapore](https://sg.asiatatler.com/style/best-alternative-wellness-treatments-singapore)) Patients are at the heart of the clinic, and the physicians make it a point to involve patients in the decision-making process. Your opinions and preferences are taken into account during diagnosis and discussion of your treatment plan, ensuring you feel comfortable all the way. "We believe that relationship building is a key aspect of our service. Our patients not only receive healing of the body but relaxation and healing of the mind as well," says a clinic spokesperson.
